node.text:
[ Warning: Sensitive Content ] or [ Where ‘Sensitivity’ Is Coming From ] Part III

In my last posts I’ve made points which I’ll refresh now, so all of us are on the same page.

- Big companies always will please and serve a majority of society to keep making money. 

- Policy and restrictions for nudity content don’t really work.

- Any kid, under 18, can easily get access to nude content, whatever he wants to fulfill his curiosity. 

- On my personal opinion, majority Millennium and especially Z generations have very specific taste for ‘the nude’, which usually I consider to call a pornography. 

I am aware, that from all this 4 point of view, you might want to argue only about last one. But I’m sure, deeply inside, you know that it’s right too. But as many of you, you just can’t accept the fact, that present aspect ‘the nude’ it’s ‘the pornography’ and how I mentioned in my post as well, pornography it’s not ‘the nude’. 

Then where is ‘the nude’?

Of course, ‘the nude’ is still exist and it always will be. The biggest part of it now, simply covered by restrictions and policy, which created to protect ‘sensitive’ majority part of society. 

‘Sensitive Majority’. Who are they? 

I don’t know how about you guys, but the answer for me is more than obvious. ‘Sensitive Majority’ is all human beings, but only over filled with anger, jealousy, depression, false pride, selfishness and another negativity feelings which cover not only their eyes, but soul, heart and mind as well… Being blindfolded by all this feelings, they can’t see beauty not only in ‘the nude’, but unfortunately in any aspects of life. 

How does someone became a member of a ‘sensitive majority’?

Most of my followers while they were growing up, heard from their parents and not only from them: “When you grow up, you can be whatever you want to be”. I heard the same from my mom. But after this sentence, there was always one more: “But whatever you decided to be, be the best”. And I’m not sure that a lot of people heard this kinda P.S. or if heard it, decided that it’s not such important part of that an amazing opportunity to be anyone you want.

To be continued…

node.text:
[ Warning: Sensitive Content ] or [ Oops, I did it again ] Part II

And I’ll do it again and again... until probably my account will be removed because I've made uncomfortable a lot of sensitive people...

Since all this Sensitive bullsh*t kinda stuck inside my head, I’ve reflected about it for past couple days. I'll say nothing about true sensitive stuff such as violence, hate speech, bullying and abuse on any subjects which based on race, sex, gender and etc., which definitely must not allowed to be in social media platforms such as Instagram. 

Instead, I'd like to focus on such delicate matters as nude. I didn’t do any research, as I usually do if I want to talk about something I don’t really know.

At this case, my education degree allowed me easily to speak up on this subjects, because I've spent 6 years of quality time in Saint Petersburg University and went through many hours of classes for art history, world history, culture, philosophy, literature and ethics.

Don’t be afraid, I’m not going to give you boring art history lesson about “How important is the place of nudity in art”, if you’re really interested in this or you know nothing - Google it.

I just want to summarize all my knowledge in one sentence:

‘The Nude’ is an important and integral aspect of artistic tradition, which makes it an inevitable factor in the comprehensive review of the art. ”

There is no place for any kind of: ‘BUT’, ‘OR’, ‘EXCEPT’ and let’s make it clear, a pornography isn’t a nude. Period and Amen.

And now, I'm slowly bringing you to more important questions: Who decides in present time/world what 'the nude' is? Where is edge between 'the nude' and 'a pornography'? And last but not least: Why, if new restrictions have being created and signed every month, Instagram is still full with nude bodies, which in most cases are really just a pornography.

To be continued ...

P.S. I've turned on comments, not only because it does go better with Instagram algorithm and higher engagement to the post, but also because I'd like to know your opinion about current subject and any upcoming ones. Just please, be respectful in my 'house' not only to me, but to another guests as well.

node.text:
[ Warning: Sensitive Content ] or [ Brett and Alex Are Again Spotted In The Shower ] Part I

I want to say thank you to everyone who sent me DM about new Instagram policy ‘Sensitive Content Control’. I try to be a good blogger and always check news about Social Media. I changed my settings at the same day when ‘SCC’ went on. I just didn’t think it’ll affect numbers so much and that policy will cut engagement in more than a half. 

So…Ok, I totally get it. For 13 years, I’ve posted a lot of sensitive content and a lot of this post also were removed. Since my last post has been removed in 2019 and I got notice from Instagram that my account could be remove for good, I’ve decided be more careful with images for my posts which could offend people who were already offended by God. 

And I understand Instagram, once a platform became a major player, there were started a work to please every sensitive layer of society [ especially in USA ] and of course to protect our innocent juvenile humans being under 18 years old. 

Let's be honest... I think, we all understand that the current generation Z, is already depraved, filthy and damaged that no rules or restrictions will stop them, if they want to get or to see anything. [ but today isn’t about that ].

Separate words of gratitude, I would like to say to all people, who we all nicely call ‘haters’. You made me smile and laugh so hard. As much as I receive light, kind and good messages from followers around the globe, I again start getting dark messages full of hate, anger and envy. But this morning, the most surprising part, when this messages came from people who actually follow me… 

I never will understand this kinda people, as I never again will try to find an excuse for them or questioning their behavior. Poor souls, which became so dark, that even if you inject their hearts with light they will reject it and spit it in your face. I'v been one of them for past couple years, but after all, I just realized, I'm simply not one of them. I don't want to reject light. Not anymore... 

To be continued…

P.S. How do you like our new "caught in the act" pictures with @brettm10 ? 😎✌🏻

node.text:
[ Man Of His Word ] or [ Uncovered Project Is Coming Back ] 

Last evening, when I’ve walked on the beach and have one of my honest conversations with Ocean, I decided to resume work on project Uncovered. 

I finaly got to a point, that a lot of my followers in 2018 weren’t ready for this project. Most of you,  just took it as some ‘insta gay hunk’ decided publish a books with his d*ck and by that to satisfy his ego, justify his miserable existence and of course make some coin for life. Only 1 point from 3 was right. I did want to make money on this, but honestly I'm still not sure if there was some big profit from it, if to count all expenses together. The project helped me stay afloat, but nothing more.

Now I understand, that project Uncovered gave me much more that I even could have imagined. Beside the fact, that I got an incredible and priceless experience, this project will bring to this world so much more than just 150 pages book in soft cover. 

By sitting on the beach, on front of my friend, I realized why Uncovered Vol.5 Seafarer haven’t published yet. Not because, how I thought, there is not enough images to tell a story, or not because I couldn’t get my shit together for past 2 years. Even though, by being honest with you guys, I did felt pretty empty inside, after I've published 3 volumes Uncovered in 2018 and Vol.4 Woodsman has taken my last energy in 2019. 

Some of you, who's a creator as well, that feeling could be familiar. You can't always be in an action, in the action of creation. If you're a True Creator, you always give to a project a piece of your soul and heart, because exactly this 2 substances make anything meaningful, not only for you, but for another people as well. 

Project Uncovered from beginning to end was my idea. Characters, locations, how I’ll look like, what I’ll wear, and I’m not even talking about production part with logistics, finance and etc. 

Of course there is no way, I could have done this project without my long time friend @dmitrybocharov. We’ve worked together side by side for 10 years. His vision, skills and experience as photographer made Uncovered, a real and visible for your eyes.

To be continued...

node.text:
[ @abramovlex_2.0 ] or [ I Invite You To My New Journey ]

Hi guys! I’m in a big process of changing right now and what I’m trying to do is to take control of this process, by creating new account where I’m going to bare my soul and make it as personal and truthful as it could be or better say, must be. I’ve exposed my body for almost 8 years and probably still will for another 10. But now I know, there is much more I can offer to this world and not just a couple of big pecs.

I’m going to share with you my recipe for life. I’ll tell you about all ingredients what I use. Step by step, I’ll to explain you, what to add to life to make it tasty. Little by little, I’m going to show you how and what I feed my soul and mind to keep my heart kind and wildly open even if sometimes it seems impossible to do. 

Through my posts with images, videos and 2200 characters captions, you’ll get to know more about my perception and vision of life. I’ll share with you my thoughts, memories, feelings and dreams. I’ll make posts about my life experience which not necessarily, but might help you with your life. 

In @abramovlex_2.0, you'll find some memories from different age of mine. I'll take you as far as I was a baby with white, curly as cloud hair to a present time where I’m already a man 6’2 and 230 lbs, who sometimes has a beard like a woodsman in a hermitage or has a mustache as a seafarer in a long voyage. 

I’ll also tell you more about my #mobileapp @FRMLAB, where I layout all posts and which helps me to Tell You - My Story. In September we’ll release FRMLAB ver 3.0 with more features, more powerful tools and of course more fine designed templates with frame. 

I see a really big future for this project. I know there are a lot people as me who would like to tell and show their stories as well as their vision and presentation of live. We’ve created a potent tool which will help to turn your life moments and memories into perfect posts. 

FRMLAB is available in AppleStore and GooglePlay and it’s free to download. 

Stay tuned. It’ll be interesting journey. 

Hug, Lex.

node.text:
[ @abramovlex_2.0 ] or [ Let’s Change And Grow Together ] 

Yesterday I got very unpleasant message in DM and also comment on my post about my account and thoughts which I recently started writing down here. The message contained such a blob of negativity that I think, it has been written by a group of people and not by one person. I’m not going to go through details. For all this years, my skin became so thick and impenetrable that I could have called myself - Man of Steel. 

I would like to say, thank you - to person who wrote it. Because while I’ve had my morning tea, I got in mind couple thoughts. As some of you know, everything what happens in life, happens for a reason. And especially when something bad or unpleasant happened, there are 2 rules which we need to follow unquestioningly. 1st - control emotions and never react. 2nd - see the lesson which life teaches you, learn from it and change something that it would never happen again. It’s very hard to do and it’s why 99% people reacting or overreacting and most of them never learn from it and do the same mistakes again and again. To change and by that to grow - probably one of the hardest work, which every human could do in life, why most of the people give up, without even try. 

My Grandma always sayed to me: “If you cannot change circumstances change your attitude to it”… but at this point, I can change circumstances and I will. When I’ve started my Instagram path in 2013, at first it was unconsciously and later became consciously - I've grown my audience by feeding them with my body. I’ve changed, so I decided it’s time to upgrade Instagram as well. But I was naive as 5 years old kid, who thought it will work and my followers will change and grow together with me. 

I decided to open 2nd account @abramovlex_2.0 which isn’t going to be about my body, but about my soul, perception and vision of life. Everyone who would like to change and grow - Follow me there.

This account I’ll leave for project Uncovered and my relationship with @brettm10. 

P.S. There won’t be anymore an opportunity to leave comments on my posts in both accounts. Have some good thought or nice message to send - use DM. 
 Hug, Lex.

node.text:
[ A Dream With Meaning ] or [ How Our Unconsciousness Gives Us Clues When We Need It The Most ] Part II

I opened the Almanac and sit down on chair. I’ve started flip page after page and read all short letters and wishes words from my classmates, friends and teachers. When I was reading it, I knew and more important I felt that all words are sincere and kind. 

We weren’t kids when we wrote each other this letters, but at this moment we didn’t know much about real life. The real life, where darkness is in a privileged position and where light exists, but it’s very hard to find, stay close and keep it on.

Page by page, letters by letters, memories covered me like a tsunami that I couldn't even hold back tears. And then I saw a short letter from my teacher Miss Khan. She became our teacher of Russian language and Literature in middle school.  She has been with us for 4 years before graduation year. Smart, educated and intelligent woman with a great sense of patience to teenagers who just want to do anything but don’t go to school. 

My ability to reflect and write down my thoughts established at lessons with Miss Khan. 

I read her letter to me a few time because I couldn't believe to words I just read. Her 10 sentences, which only now, after 17 years ago, start making sense for me.

She wrote: “Alexander, you always amaze me with your dedication and determination to achieve your goals. I hope that your goals will always be noble and worthy of you. Never worry about tomorrow. Do everything that depends on you today, because the luck of tomorrow is built on what and how we do in present. You've been given a lot and you've learned a lot in recent years at school. Nothing comes for free and everything becomes meaningful over time. Remember this and try to learn from life, drawing conclusions, thanks to them and be ready to change. The human path is an endless and long path to himself. I’m grateful to you for teaching me to look not at external things, but in the depths of the human heart. This is a beautiful, but difficult job, but without a doubt, it leads to Happiness…”

To be continued…

node.text:
[ A Dream With Meaning ] or [ How Our Unconsciousness Gives Us Clues When We Need It The Most ] Part I 

5 days ago, I’ve had a dream. I sit alone in classroom in my school. Room was full of light. I turned my head on the left. A window was open and through I saw a habitual view on the street, which I’ve seen a thousand time, being bored during class. 

I wore my dark green suite, which I've worn last 2 years before graduation. My tie was loose and I realized that it’s after school hours. In room was so quiet that I could hear birds chirp outside. On the desk in front of me was an open notebook, a pen and nothing else. 

I tried to remember, what I was doing here, why I sit alone in my classroom and what I need to do. Write…? I took a pen in my hands and at this moment, someone opened the door. And at the moment of opening the door happened a draft and the window closed with a full swing, making an eerie sound. The sound that scared me and I woke up...

It was 5 am, my usual time to get up for last months. I immediately tried to remember who came inside room, but I couldn’t. The moment when door has opened, the sound of a slamming window made me closed my eyes.

I got up and went to kitchen to make a tea. While tea was brewing, I went to the bathroom where I washed my face and put contacts on. My usual ritual for past 3 years. I back to kitchen, add creamer to tea and went to 2nd bedroom, where I work. There was a mess from last night. From nowhere, I decided to organize boxes with my old stuff, didn't finish and went to bed. I already forgot about it and honestly got a little bit annoyed with myself and said loud: “F*ck, why I didn’t finish it last night?” 

I started moving stuff around by feet and trying to make a road to my desk. By accident, I pushed a stack with old books and I saw school almanac. A book with short essays on different subjects which we wrote during Literature Class. 

The Almanac was one of few things I always took with me when I moved. From Kazakhstan to Russia, and then from Russia to USA. And I began to understand why… All this time I took the Almanac with me, so one day like this morning, I could find it and open. 

To be continued…

node.text:
[ 11 Years of Friendship ] or [ A Friend To Whom I Can Bare Not Only My Soul But Body As Well ] Part II

In April 2013, I’ve traveled to USA, Florida, Miami Beach to celebrate my birthday. After 2 years of friendship with #Ocean, I couldn’t wait to meet him again and to be introduced to his another side - #Atlantic. 2 weeks in 2011 which I’ve spent with #Pacific was amazing. 

How it's supposed to be in any relationship between 2 souls, I coudn't wait again to meet and to get to know him better. Any #friendship as any #relationship, in my understanding, it’s an exchange of energy. The key to a good, long-term friendship or relationship is a continuous and stable #exchange of #energy. During this process, as long as it's #equal, you grow and get #stronger...

One day, I'll tell you more about relationship and friendship from my point of view, but today is about a good friend of mine - Ocean and my way to meet Atlantic.

I'll never forget this 12 hours transatlantic flight from Moscow to Miami Beach. Somewhere in the middle of flight, when our airplane flew over Atlantic, we got into a turbulence zone. I, who is always fight the fear of flying, was literally ready to die. The plane has been in turbulence for almost 1,5 hours and I already wasn’t so excited about this meeting. If in first meeting with Ocean, I can easily jumped off from our “cold handshake”, his another side Atlantic, didn’t give this opportunity and showed me that our friendship could have ended without even started.

*My aerophobia based on the inability to control a situation. After a big crush accident in 2006, if there is any chance that I could drive a car myself for a long distance, I’ll do it or I’ll be nervous all road long.

As you understand, my flight landed safely and as I dropped my luggage in hotel, I went to meet this unfriendly guy...

To be continued…

P.S. Pictures, which you see in this post, have taken on West Coast by @dmitrybocharov for project #Uncovered. 5 chapters of Uncovered has been captured in different parts of #California. This lifetime experience which I got during production for Uncovered, always will have special place in my heart…

node.text:
[ 11 Years of Friendship ] or [ A Friend To Whom I Can Bare Not Only My Soul But Body As Well ] Part I

I met Ocean for the 1st time in 2010, in Thailand, Phuket Island. I’ve traveled there to celebrate and meet New 2011 Year. I was very exited to meet him, because how I heard from many people that he's amazing and can be a good friend. 

Don’t be confused and there's no correction needed. I know that in English, nouns denoting inanimate objects and abstract concepts, phenomena belong to the neuter gender. In Russian language we have different rules and Ocean has pronounce “he/him”. But besides grammar rules, personally for me, Оcean has a soul and that soul is much better than most of people I know. 

As I remember, our first meeting, Ocean was very calm, even though it was daytime, the color of water was midnight blue. The sun shone brightly and periodically went behind the clouds. I took shoes off, rolled pants up and came closer to him.

Step by step, I approached to Ocean and I saw how he was going to meet me too, by sending small waves to the shore. Our “handshake” was very cold and quick, after which I immediately jumped off to a "safe distance” and I looked at the Ocean again. Majestic, endless, deep, free and handsome. I thought, what I scared? 

So, I've started walking forward again until my ankles were covered by water. Less than a minute and Ocean wasn’t already so cold. And I felt at this moment, we can became friends for long time. 

For more than 10 years, Ocean and I became very close friends. Our friendship is pure. As no one else Ocean can feel me. He is always there and always gives me support when I need it the most. We can seat opposite each other for hours and didn’t say a word or we can walk next to each other and listen music. He never judges me and even though, Ocean has very specific way to speak, he always listen me and give me as much time as I need to speak out.

To be continued... 

P.S. I have only 2 friends in my life, with whom I can easily take off my clothes and without any embarrassment feel comfortable. It’s Ocean and my #goodfriend @dmitrybocharov who does all my pictures for past 10 years.

node.text:
[ Us And Saturday Morning. Lost Somewhere in California ] or [ There are a lot stories in my life, but this one is very special for me ] 

Since the moment I’ve met Brett in May 2016, I grown more than 240.000 followers. So I assume many of you already know @brettm10 as my boyfriend and man of my heart. 

Incredibly handsome, smart, mature and tall - how is it possible to resist such a combination and not fall in love with? Impossible… So I did fell and this year we've celebrated 5 years annyversary. 

Of course, our relationship doesn’t look always as lovely, nice and peaceful, how you can see on this pictures, but we’ve been working on our relationship since day one and 5 years just proved that if you hard work on it and want to make it happened - you always can make it through. I’ve shared some stories from my diary in project Uncovered, but a lot of time has passed since books were published and there are so many stories more to tell, that I probably can write a whole novel. Who knows, maybe one day I’m going to…

Stay tune, put notifications on and soon you will read more about Brett&Alex. Russian and American with gap of 15 years between, who shared a lot common interests, who help each other to grow, who support each other dreams, and who don’t give up relationship when road goes rocky.  Aries and Gemini who loves to travel, to cook and to watch RuPaul Drag Race… and the list goes on and on and on… 

Brett is the one, who gave me huge support and helped me to create #MobileApp @FRMLAB, which helps me and a lot people to tell their stories. 

Download #FRMLAB, Start Using 400 Beautifully Designed Templates and Tell Your Story. Wrapped Your Memories and Share It With Your Friends And Followers. #FRMLAB is available in #AppleStore and #GooglePlay [ link you can find in my bio ] 

#socialmedia #journey #lifemoments #becreative #InstagramFeed #InstaStories #unique #templates #lifestories #storyofmylife #tellyourstory #storyteller #memories #boyfriendsBelike #BrettandAlex #gaycouple #loveislove #lovewins #lgbtq

node.text:
[ Trip Of LifeTime ] or [ 13 Days Which Changed My Life Forever ]

Yesterday I mentioned in my post, that a writing for me is kind of therapy. Today I would like to tell you, about my favorite self-therapy - a traveling. 

One day I’ll share with you stories about most of my adventures, especially which change me and my perspective of life. Since 2001, I’ve visited 24 countries and for past 6 years I explored 17 cites in 11 states in America. Memories from each journey I carefully keep in my heart and mind, which I cherish and would like to share with you.

Today, I want to bring your attention to an unforgettable trip to Vietnam in February 2019. It was my first trip outside of USA, since I’ve moved here in 2015. A special thank you I would like to say to @p.u.c.k.e.t.t  who owns travel agency and who invited me to join this trip to Vietnam and Cambodia. 

Since May 2015, when I moved to USA and started my asylum case for green card, I wasn’t able to travel outside of country. In first place, it didn’t scare me, because I thought that a big country like USA will quench my thirst for traveling. And it did quenched, but it was like eat the same meal 3 times per day, each day. Don’t get me wrong, I love to travel around the country. Each state is unique, beautiful and worth to visit, but an experience of culture was always the same, at least for me. 

It was 3rd day of our adventure in North Vietnam, province Ninh Binh, when we climbed up to 500 steps to Dragon Mountain to see an incredible, I would say, epic view of the river and vast landscape. The Quan Am Statue, which represents the Goddess of Mercy, boats coast down the Ngo Dong River and of course Mua Caves Towers. 

I promise, I’ll tell you more about this amazing trip later, but now I want to tell why this adventure changed my life. Besides that this journey gave me a big breath of fresh air inside of my body and soul, it also reminds me how immense and beautiful our land is, and it was exactly what I’ve missed for all this years. But most important, this trip gave me an idea to create mobile application @FRMLAB, which can help me and all people, to show and to tell a story.

To be continued…
